snippet: The Slow Money National Gathering in Boulder, Colo., brought together small and local food enterprises with financiers as an antidote to big agriculture.
abstract: Slow Money National Gathering in Boulder, Colo, draws small and local food enterprises and venture capital investors committed to healing broken agriculture system through manpower or money.
lead_paragraph: The Slow Money National Gathering in Boulder, Colo., brought together small and local food enterprises with financiers as an antidote to big agriculture.

headline.seo: A Bid to Put Money Behind Slow Food Movement
headline.main: An Effort to Add a Key Ingredient to the Slow Food Movement: Investor Money
headline.print_headline: An Effort to Add a Key Ingredient to the Slow Food Movement: Investor Money
